data.title: Data Cable​
data.availSteps:
•  Collect the offer from TCP App​
  •  Click on ‘Shop Now’ and select products of your choice associated with the offer OR Walk into anyTitan store and select products of your choice associated with the offer​
  •  Offer is auto-applied at checkout page or payment counter​
